sentences.sentence: Archers can be as nervous in battle as arquebusiers.
sentences.translation: 弓箭手在战斗中一样会紧张。

sentences.sentence: Arquebusiers can only stand two deep, archers are effective even six deep, when the rear ranks shoot with a high trajectory.
sentences.translation: 火绳枪兵只能站两列，而长弓兵则更有效率因为他能有六列的纵深，只要后面的人使用抛射。
